content:
IWithSecondaryNetworkInterface Interface

Definition

The stage of virtual machine definition allowing to specify additional network interfaces.

In this Article

public interface IWithSecondaryNetworkInterface

Methods

WithExistingSecondaryNetworkInterface(INetworkInterface)

Associate an existing network interface with the virtual machine. Note this method's effect is additive, i.e. each time it is used, the new secondary network interface added to the virtual machine.
WithNewSecondaryNetworkInterface(ICreatable<INetworkInterface>)

Create a new network interface to associate with the virtual machine, based on the provided definition. Note this method's effect is additive, i.e. each time it is used, the new secondary network interface added to the virtual machine.
